item.title: Alien DNA: when six bases are better than four
item.author: Matilda Hay,
item.description: Are six bases better than four? Scientists at The Scripps Institute Florida, can boast that they have changed the secret of life; they have invented an extension to our DNA. All life forms have DNA in their cells. DNA is made from four different nucleotides, and, depending on the order of these …

item.title: Maybe you should sleep on it...
item.author: Matilda Hay,
item.description: Did you, like everyone else, vow to get more sleep this year? Sleeping is common to all animals and a vital part of staying healthy and alert. However, when we sleep we are missing opportunities to be more productive, and by switching off we leave ourselves vulnerable to attack. It must be a very …
